curam.util.client.domain.marshal
Class SimpleXPathMarshal.DOMContextHelper

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.client.domain.marshal.SimpleXPathMarshal.DOMContextHelper
Enclosing class:
SimpleXPathMarshal
public static class SimpleXPathMarshal.DOMContextHelper
extends java.lang.Object

A helper class that stores the DOM context node. A sub-class may be created to store additional information, if required. A new instance of the sub-class can be created by overriding the main class's createDOMContextHelper method. For example, an implementation could store index or configuration information collected as the marshal operates. The object will cached for all path resolution for a single property of a display-phase server-interface. It will be released when rendering is complete.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new DOM context helper and sets the DOM context node.
